original_title: Il était une fois le Continental Circus
overview: 3 hours of an epic lived since the 70s, represented by a handful of men for whom life has meaning only in the fulfillment of their passion. Bernard Fau, 45 years later takes the track and continues the adventure by filming it. 3 hours of testimonials, with legendary drivers, unpublished archive images and current races.
tagline: To remember and tell is to love once again.
title: Once Upon a Time There was the Continental Circus
